s1.title: Velocity Generator
s1.p: If called from a Flowscript, the Cocoon Velocity Generator provides access to the immediate properties of the context object passed to cocoon.sendPage and cocoon.sendPageAndWait. In addition, the current WebContinuation is also available as a variable named $continuation. You would typically access its id:
You can also reach previous continuations by using the getParent() function:
In addition the following implicit objects are always available in the Velocity context:

dl.dd: The Cocoon response associated with the current request
The Cocoon session associated with the current request
The Cocoon context associated with the current request
Any parameters passed to the generator in the pipeline
